程序包 net.minecraftforge.client.event

类 ScreenEvent.KeyReleased

java.lang.Object
net.minecraftforge.eventbus.api.Event
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent.KeyInput
net.minecraftforge.client.event.ScreenEvent.KeyReleased
直接已知子类:
ScreenEvent.KeyReleased.Post, ScreenEvent.KeyReleased.Pre
封闭类:
ScreenEvent
public abstract static class ScreenEvent.KeyReleased extends ScreenEvent.KeyInput
Fired when a keyboard key is released. See the two subclasses for listening before and after the normal handling.
另请参阅:
  • ScreenEvent.KeyReleased.Pre
  • ScreenEvent.KeyReleased.Post

  • 嵌套类概要

    嵌套类
    修饰符和类型
    类
    说明
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.KeyReleased.Post
    Fired after the key release is handled, if not handled by the screen and the corresponding ScreenEvent.KeyReleased.Pre is not cancelled.
    static class 
    ScreenEvent.KeyReleased.Pre
    Fired before the key release is handled by the screen.
